page.title: 07ENTERTAINMENT-PORTPATRICK
page.content: Apart from musical entertainment in local hostelries from time to time, and an amusement arcade,there is no commercial entertainment available. The Regional Council encourages entertainers of all types to appear at the Public Hall in due season and the villagers are resourceful in making their own entertainment. Besides the clubs listed on P3 there is a monthly whist drive and domino tournament in aid of senior citizens.Jumble sales,whist and beetle drives,sales of work,all social events as well as fund-raising enterprises, are organised by the various clubs. Concerts,children's parties at Hallowe'en and Christmas and Burns Suppers in January combine with the above to make for a fairly full winter's entertainment.
